name: 甜花
text: え……ゲームセンター……！？
trans: Eh... the arcade...!?

name: 千雪
text:
……わぁ、ちょっと意外だなぁ
甘奈ちゃんもゲームセンターに行くのね
trans:
...Ah, that's a little surprising.
So Amana goes to the arcade as well?

name: 甘奈
text:
え～？　ヘンかなぁ
甘奈、色んなとこに行くよー？
trans:
Eh? Is that weird?
I go to many different places you know~?

name: 千雪
text:
そうよね、ごめんなさい……
変ってことじゃないの！
trans:
You're right, I'm sorry...
It's not weird at all!

name: 甘奈
text: ううん！　甘奈気にしてないよ！
trans: Don't worry! I'm not bothered by it!

name: プロデューサー
text:
お、みんな……
取材の件か？　もう取り組んでくれてるんだな
trans: Oh, everyone... Is this about collecting the materials? I see you're already working hard on it.

name: 千雪
text:
あ、プロデューサーさん
お疲れ様です
trans: Ah, Producer. Thanks for the hard work.

name: 甘奈
text: お疲れ様で～す！
trans: Thanks for the hard work!

name: 甜花
text: お、お疲れ様です……
trans: T-Thanks for the hard work...

name: 千雪
text:
今、甘奈ちゃんがゲームセンターを提案してくれてて
──ねぇ、どんなところなの？
trans:
Just now, Amana-chan suggested the arcade.
Say, what is that place like?

name: 甘奈
text:
えっとね～……
ちょっとレトロなゲームセンター、って感じかな～
trans:
Erm let's see...
It's sort of a retro arcade, maybe?

name: 千雪
text:
へぇ～そうなの！
ふふ、ますます意外……！
trans:
Oh, is that so?
Fufu, that's even more surprising!

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈、学校の友達とかと結構行ったりするんだって！
trans: I often go there with my friends after school!

name: 甘奈
text: プリとか撮るついでっていうか……
trans: Kinda like a small detour after taking Purikura...

name: 甜花
text:
な、なーちゃん……
そこって、事務所に来る……途中の……？
trans:
N-Na-chan...
Is that, the one on the way... to the office...?

name: 甘奈
text: そうそう！
trans: Yeah yeah!

name: 甘奈
text:
本格的なゲームがたくさんありそうだなーって
感じのとこ！
trans:
The place that feels like
it'll have lots of legit games!

name: 甜花
text:
！　あそこなんだね……
にへへ……
trans:
Oh... So it's that place...
Nihehe...

name: プロデューサー
text:
うーん、確かに面白い記事になるかもな
甜花は、何かあるか？
trans: Hmm, it does seem like that'll make for an interesting article. Tenka, do you have any place in mind?

name: 甜花
text: て、甜花は……
trans: T-Tenka...

name: 甜花
text: ……ブックカフェが良い、かな……
trans: ...Wants to go to a Book Café...

name: 甘奈
text: あー！　新しくできてたとこだよね！
trans: Ah! That's the new place isn't it!

name: 千雪
text:
わぁ……そうなのね
それも素敵……
trans:
My... is that so?
That sounds lovely too...

name: 千雪
text:
でも……ふふっ、ごめんなさい
甜花ちゃんも、ちょっと意外かも！
trans:
But... Fufu, I'm sorry.
That's also a little surprising coming from Tenka!

name: プロデューサー
text:
色んな本とか雑貨屋が併設されてるカフェだよな
そっか、そんなのも良いなぁ
trans: Isn't that the Café that has a variety of books and is opened with a sundries store? I see, that might be nice too.

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……色んな本があって……
お勉強、できるし……
trans: Y-Yes... they have a variety of books... And we can, study there...

name: 甜花
text: それに……おしゃれ
trans: The place is... very stylish.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん！　甘奈もそう思う！
しかも、この辺だと１番品揃えが良いんだよね～！
trans:
Yeah! I think so too!
Plus, it has the best selection in this area!

name: 甘奈
text:
あ～……
最近、新しく出たのとか買えてなかったなぁ……
trans:
Ah...
I haven't bought any of the new releases recently...

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん……にへへ……
trans: Na-chan... Nihehe...

name: 千雪
text:
……そっか
ふたりとも本当に、仲が良いんだ……ふふ
trans:
...I see.
The two of you really do get along well... Fufu.

name: 甘奈
text:
……でもでも、ブックカフェも良いけど
甘奈はゲームセンターを推したいな☆
trans:
...But but, while the book café is nice.
I really recommend the arcade!

name: 甜花
text:
ぶ、ブックカフェ……新しくできたところだし……
紹介した方がいい、と思う……
trans:
T-The book café... is a new place...
We should, probably introduce it...

name: 甜花
text:
あと、甜花は……なーちゃんと一緒に
ゆっくり本を読むの、良い……かも
trans:
Also, Tenka thinks..
that reading books leisurely with Na-chan might be... nice.

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……
trans: Tenka...

name: 甘奈
text: ……えへ、確かに、ブックカフェも素敵だよね☆
trans: ...Eheh, a book café is certainly great!

name: 甘奈
text:
でも、本当に地元っていうか……
あんまり知られてないとこに注目するの、良いかも～って
trans: But, if it's some place that is truly local... Featuring some place that is not well known might be nicer!

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……だけど……
trans: Y-Yeah... but...

name: 甜花
text: 本を読むとこも……知りたい人、いる気がする……
trans: It feels like there might be people... who wants to know about a place, to read books...

name: 甘奈＆甜花
text: う～ん……
trans: Hmm...

name: 千雪
text:
……ふふ
こういう時も声が揃っちゃうのね
trans:
Fufu.
...Even at times like this, they're thinking of the same thing.

name: 千雪
text:
ね、それじゃ、
……どっちも行ってみない？
trans:
Say, then...
How about we go to both places?

name: 甜花
text:
え……どっちも……？
でも……おすすめの場所の記事、１個しかない……
trans:
Eh... both...?
But... There's only one article for the recommendation...

name: 千雪
text:
うん。でも、実際に行ってみて、
それから決めることもできるんじゃないかしら
trans:
Yeah.
But we can go to the places first then decide after that.

name: 千雪
text: ──どうですか？　プロデューサーさん？
trans: What do you think? Producer?

name: プロデューサー
text:
なるほど、下見ってことだな
そうだな……時間的にも余裕があるから、大丈夫じゃないか
trans:
I see, so we're surveying the places first.
Let's see... we still have plenty of time, so I guess it's fine.

name: 甘奈
text:
そっか～……千雪さんすご～い！
そういうこともできるよね！
trans:
Is that so?
That's amazing Chiyuki! So we can do that as well!

name: 甘奈
text:
えへ！　それなら、
千雪さんの行きたいところも教えてもらわなきゃ！
trans:
Well! In that case,
Chiyuki has to tell us about the place she wants to go!

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……！
教えてもらわなきゃ……！
trans:
Y-Yeah...!
You have to tell us...!

name: 千雪
text: わ、私の……？
trans: M-Mine...?

name: 千雪
text:
……えっと……改まっておすすめの場所ってなると、
やっぱり難しいっていうか……
trans: ...Erm... Seriously thinking about a place I'll recommend, is indeed rather difficult...

name: 甘奈
text: そうなの……？
trans: Is that so...?

name: 千雪
text:
うん、ふたりともありがとう
……でも……
trans:
Yeah, thanks you two...
But...

name: 千雪
text:
今回は、私……甘奈ちゃんと甜花ちゃんの
行きたいところがいいな
trans:
This time, I... think that the places that
Amana and Tenka want to go to are really nice.

name: 甘奈
text:
そっか～……
じゃあ、千雪さんの行きたい場所も、見つけなきゃだね☆
trans: Is that so? Then, we have to find a place where Chiyuki-san would want to go to!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……！
て、甜花も……考える……！
trans:
Yeah...!
T-Tenka will... also think about it...!

name: 千雪
text:
まぁ……
ありがとう、甘奈ちゃん、甜花ちゃん
trans:
My...
Thank you, Amana, Tenka.

name: 千雪
text: それはまた、きっとね……
trans: That as well, definitely...
